title: Surprising Things That Are War Crimes

media:group.media:title: Surprising Things That Are War Crimes
media:group.media:description:
We've all heard of the more common war crimes, like not killing an enemy who's just surrendered. The Geneva Conventions go quite in-depth, though, and some things that seem proper are actually war crimes.
